text: Jolanda van Meggelen (born 1961) is a Dutch former judoka. She won a medal at the inaugural female World Judo Championships, winning the bronze medal at the 1980 World Judo Championships in the -72kg category. Two years later she won the silver medal at the 1982 European Judo Championships. She lived with her parents in Maassluis. In the early 1980s she became a certified child caregiver. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch judoka Category:Sportspeople from South Holland
title: Jolanda van Meggelen
